Class SpecialVendingMachine

java.lang.Object
RegularVendingMachine
SpecialVendingMachine
public class SpecialVendingMachine extends RegularVendingMachine
The SpecialVendingMachine class represents a special vending machine that can create and sell custom coffee drinks using specific ingredients from the regular vending machine's slots. It extends the RegularVendingMachine class and adds functionality for managing coffee ingredients and creating custom coffee drinks.

      protected ArrayList<ArrayList<Ingredient>> coffeeIngredients

  • Constructor Details

    • SpecialVendingMachine

      public SpecialVendingMachine(String name, int numberOfSlots)
      Creates a new SpecialVendingMachine instance with the given name and number of slots. Initializes the coffeeIngredients list to an empty ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the special vending machine.
      numberOfSlots - The number of slots in the vending machine.

  • Method Details

    • updateSales

      public void updateSales(Coffee coffee)
      Updates the sales record for a given Coffee instance by adding the coffee's price to the total sales and incrementing the total number of ingredients and coffees sold.
      Parameters:
      coffee - The Coffee instance to update the sales record for.

    • createSummary

      public String createSummary()
      Overrides the createSummary method from the parent class to include the total number of coffees sold in the summary.
      Overrides:
      createSummary in class RegularVendingMachine
      Returns:
      A string containing the summary of sales and inventory since the last maintenance.

    • addCoffeeIngredient

      public boolean addCoffeeIngredient(String name, int quantity)
      Adds a specified quantity of a regular vending machine ingredient to the coffee ingredients list. The method checks if there is enough of the ingredient available in the regular vending machine before adding it to the coffee ingredients list.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the ingredient to add.
      quantity - The quantity of the ingredient to add.
      Returns:
      true if the ingredient was successfully added, false otherwise.

    • updateSlots

      public boolean updateSlots(ArrayList<ArrayList<Ingredient>> ingredients)
      Updates the vending machine slots and current inventory by removing the ingredients used to create a coffee from the coffee ingredients list.
      Parameters:
      ingredients - The ingredients used to create a coffee.
      Returns:
      true if the vending machine slots and inventory were updated, false otherwise.

    • createCoffee

      public Coffee createCoffee()
      Creates a custom Coffee instance based on the coffee ingredients and calculates its total calories and price.
      Returns:
      The created Coffee instance with the total calories, price, and coffee ingredients.

    • countCoffeeIngredient

      public int countCoffeeIngredient(String ingredientName)
      Counts the occurrences of a specific ingredient in the coffee ingredients list.
      Parameters:
      ingredientName - The name of the ingredient to count occurrences for.
      Returns:
      The number of occurrences of the specified ingredient in the coffee ingredients list.

    • removeCoffeeIngredients

      public void removeCoffeeIngredients()
      Removes all coffee ingredients from the coffee ingredients list.

    • getCoffeeIngredients

      public ArrayList<ArrayList<Ingredient>> getCoffeeIngredients()
      Gets the list of coffee ingredients used to create custom coffee drinks.
      Returns:
      The list of coffee ingredients.
